text: mariyu miru mi prabhuvunu ksamabhiksa vedukunte, taruvata ayana vaipuku pascattapanto maralite, ayana miku nirnayincina gaduvu varaku manci sukhasantosalanu prasadistadu. Mariyu anugrahalaku ar'hudaina prati okkaniki ayana tana anugrahalanu prasadistadu kani, miru venudirigite! Niscayanga, a goppa dinamuna mipai raboye siksaku nenu bhayapadutunnanu
